title: FASAMS Client and Treatment Episode Data Schema
description: Strict validation schema for Florida DCF FASAMS 155-2 Chapter 4 (Client Data) and Chapter 5 (Treatment Episode) requirements.

SSN.description: Social Security Number must be exactly 9 digits, no dashes.

Medicaid_ID.description: Florida Medicaid Recipient ID must be exactly 10 digits.

Provider_ID.description: Unique identifier for the provider agency. Alphanumeric pattern enforced.

Admission_Date.description: The date the client was admitted to the treatment episode. Must be YYYY-MM-DD and is required.

Project_Code.description: Project codes defined in Pamphlet 155-2 Appendix 1.

Diagnosis_Code_ICD10.description: Primary diagnosis code based on ICD-10 standards.

Grant_Type.description: The type of grant funding the episode (e.g., SOR, Recovery Housing).

6-Month Follow-up.description: Date of the 6-month follow-up, if applicable.
